trans-unit.source: Gets the state of a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar tillståndet för en <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The DataRowState enumeration is returned by the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class.
trans-unit.target: En uppräkning som returneras av <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>egenskapen för <xref:System.Data.DataRow>klassen.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row has been added to a <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"></xref>, and <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*> has not been called.
trans-unit.target: Raden har lagts till en <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"> </xref>, och <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*>har inte anropats.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*>

trans-unit.source: The row was deleted using the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete*> method of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Raden togs bort via den <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete*>metod för den <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete*>

trans-unit.source: The row has been created but is not part of any <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Raden har skapats men ingår inte i någon <xref href="System.Data.DataRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> is in this state immediately after it has been created and before it is added to a collection, or if it has been removed from a collection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> är i det här tillståndet omedelbart när den har skapats och som ska läggas till en samling, eller om den har tagits bort från en samling.

trans-unit.source: The row has been modified and <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*> has not been called.
The row has not changed since <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges*> was last called.
